title: The Herd-HOUR-2-Patriots, star players, predictions
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-2-Patriots, star players, predictions
description:
Colin talks about Bill Belichick's recent comments on Cam Newton, how coaches have to handle star players, and his 5 NFL predictions.


Guests: Derek Harper, Sam Acho
